mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATCH_FILE ( ATCH_ID, ATCH_MIME, ATCH_ORIGIN_NAME, ATCH_SAVE_NAME, ATCH_SIZE, ATCH_DATE, ATCH_CONTENT ) VALUES ( #{atchId}, #{atchMime}, #{atchOriginName}, #{atchSaveName}, #{atchSize}, #{atchDate}, #{atchContent, jdbcType=BLOB} )
mapper.select: SELECT ATCH_ID , ATCH_MIME , ATCH_ORIGIN_NAME , ATCH_SAVE_NAME , ATCH_SIZE , ATCH_DATE , ATCH_CONTENT FROM ATCH_FILE WHERE ATCH_ID=#{atchId}
